data.eml:eml: Five new minute orb-weaving spiders of the family Mysmenidae from China (Araneae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lin, Yucheng, Li, Shuqiang (2013): Five new minute orb-weaving spiders of the family Mysmenidae from China (Araneae). Zootaxa 3670 (4): 449-481, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3670.4.3
